channel.title: [pi] items dissapear on drop
channel.description: how do i make it so items will appear when u drop them like where do i look and what did i search for please help thx guys.

item.title: [pi] items dissapear on drop
item.dc:creator: @Tehlife Tehlife
item.description:
@Tehlife wrote:

Ok Iâ€™ll fix your problem.

1 Search for DropItem in your whole source.
2 Open it and search for: //Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, itemId, c.getX(), c.getY(), c.playerItemsN[slot], c.getId());
3 Remove the //
4 The line under it should be like this: c.getItems().deleteItem(itemId, slot, c.playerItemsN[slot]);
5 Make it be like this //c.getItems().deleteItem(itemId, slot, c.playerItemsN[slot]);

Enjoy
